name: Manic Miners (itch)
description:
Manic Miners is an in-progress remake of Lego Rock Raiders, released in 1999. It is free for everyone to enjoy. This download is the latest EXPERIMENTAL build and will knowingly be released with bugs. It is recommended that you join the Discord server to stay up to date with what's going on: https://discord.gg/Zq7fh7u 

If you want the latest stable major update, you can visit this page for a download link: https://www.rockraidersunited.com/topic/8591-manic-miners-an-in-progress-complete-lego-rock-raiders-remake-the-buildings-and-bruises-update-is-here/

Note: If this notice is here, that means I'm just trialing this as a download alternative. This might also mean that it can be abandoned for a long while. For the latest news and updates, the Discord is your best bet.
